plot: After seeing a musical on their first date, Jack and Maureen find a heads-down penny on the sidewalk. Against Jack's advice, Maureen picks it up and the two go from seeing musicals to living them.
title: The Penny
plot_es: After seeing a musical on their first date, Jack and Maureen find a heads-down penny on the sidewalk. Against Jack's advice, Maureen picks it up and the two go from seeing musicals to living them.
plot_en: After seeing a musical on their first date, Jack and Maureen find a heads-down penny on the sidewalk. Against Jack's advice, Maureen picks it up and the two go from seeing musicals to living them.
